EmailTemplate.description: introducing Bixolon email to mcdonalds customers
EmailTemplate.name: 11-dd-22 HOS Bixolon Printer Customer Com.11-dd-22 HOS Email - Bixolon Printer C
EmailTemplate.subject: NCR Has Printers In Stock! Order Yours Today
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear Owner Operator: The Latest and Greatest Printer Has Arrived. Introducing the new high performance Bixolon Printer! Cost is only $214. What you need to know: - NCR has them in stock - Integrated Power Supply - Uses BOTH parallel and USB printing applications - Lower TCO by paper saving mode (reduces length up to 25%) - 3-year warranty Order yours today by emailing Mcdonalds.orders@ncr.com <[[mailto:Mcdonalds.orders@ncr.com]]> or calling 1-800-421-8230 Thank you, The NCR McDonalds Team  *$15 PMO fee <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
